    Posted on October 5, 2024

    Discover the Automated DICOM Analysis Tool by Kaptan Data Solutions

Our goal is to make data analysis not only faster and more accurate but also more accessible to every professional in the field. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™ve developed a fully automated tool that streamlines and optimizes complex image analyses, including the Picket Fence test, with unmatched efficiency.

    Whatâ€™s more, we integrate the power of PYLINAC, a renowned Python library specifically designed for quality assurance in medical physics. By leveraging the PicketFence module of PYLINAC, weâ€™ve extracted the very nectar of its capabilities to provide you with seamless automation. The pf.analyze() function, the backbone of our tool, ensures precise and reliable test results with minimal input. You can explore the full potential of this function in the official PicketFence documentation.

In a fully automated setup, the tool will independently fetch images from a dedicated directory, analyze them, and generate Picket Fence reports without any manual intervention.
